testsuite.name: LearningProgressTrackerTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Presentation error in test #1
The following output contains wrong number of lines (expected to be equal to 1, found 2): Bye! Total 0 students have been added.
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
Learning Progress Tracker > > back Enter 'exit' to exit the program. > exit Bye! Total 0 students have been added.
